dialogue.speaker: Lila
dialogue.text: Welcome to the land of Eldoria! I am Lila, your guide and mentor.

dialogue.speaker: Player Character
dialogue.text: I'm excited to explore this new world. What's my first task?

dialogue.speaker: Lila
dialogue.text: Your first task is to retrieve a rare herb from the nearby forest. But be warned, the forest can be treacherous.

dialogue.speaker: Narration
dialogue.text: The player ventures into the dark and mysterious forest, searching for the rare herb.

dialogue.speaker: Player Character
dialogue.text: Ahh! A giant spider is attacking me!

dialogue.speaker: Lila (voice in the distance)
dialogue.text: Fight back, adventurer! You're not alone!
